prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Guitar, Piano, Drums, Synth Lead, Strings, but without Bass.
captions:
Style 1:
Guitar, Piano, Drums, Synth Lead, and Strings are all featured in this song, but Bass is absent.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Guitar, Piano, Drums, Synth Lead, and Strings, but Bass is not included.

Style 3:
